title: Hazelnut dacquoise
description: Seriously impress with this fancy French dessert of layers of hazelnut meringue, hazelnut praline, chocolate ganache and a coffee custard filling.Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag fitted with a 1.5cm/⅝in plain nozzle and medium star nozzle, a food processor, three baking trays, a sugar thermometer and a free-standing food mixer with a whisk attachment.
